elements.name: Stellar report demo transaction test 1

dry run result is success

corresponding transfer and fee are present

"account2" has correct balances of "tXLM" after "incoming" transaction
release quarantined transfers to "account2" intent is executed
"account1" has correct balances of "tXLM" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "tXLM" after "incoming" transaction
"tXLM" funds are sent from "account2" to "account1"

Payload: '"accountId": "6e992b79-f01a-42d7-acef-6747a316e771", "parameters": {"feeStrategy":{"priority":"Medium","type":"Priority"},"maximumFee":"100600001684","pallet":{"method":{"amount":"50000000000","destination":{"address":"5FkcybNiJ2z3sxUdQJMDPqfduaYiGSUc26dm4YhKY9zDoyEA","type":"Address"},"type":"TransferKeepAlive"},"type":"Balances"},"type":"Substrate"} '
	at org.junit.Assume.assumeTrue(Assume.java:68)
	at org.junit.Assume.assumeFalse(Assume.java:75)
	at helpers.transactions.TransactionsHelper.makeAdHocDryRun(TransactionsHelper.java:41)
	at helpers.transactions.TransactionsHelper.dryRunWithDefaultAmounts(TransactionsHelper.java:222)
	at AccountsSteps.andHaveEnoughOfForTransactionWithFundsReturn(AccountsSteps.java:555)
	at ."account1" and "account2" have enough of "WND" on the balance for native transfer with funds return(file:///Users/yevheniiakrykun/projects/qa-v4/src/test/resources/features/transactions_and_accounts/SubstrateTransactions.feature:73)

the transfer to "account2" is quarantined
"account1" has correct balances of "WND" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "WND" after "incoming" transaction
release quarantined transfers to "account2" intent is executed
"account1" has correct balances of "WND" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "WND" after "incoming" transaction
"WND" funds are sent from "account2" to "account1"

all recovery transfers are released to accounts
all ongoing quarantined transfers are released to accounts
all policies except default are locked

elements.name: Tezos report demo transaction test 1

steps.name: we have two recovered "tezos-testnet-ithaca" accounts
"account1" and "account2" have enough of "tXTZ" on the balance for native transfer with funds return
dry run of tezos transaction from "account1" to address of "account2" is executed with the default maximumFee
dry run result is success
endpoint using "account2" address is created
the tezos transaction intent from "account1" to endpoint with "account2" address is executed
transaction ledger status is "Detected or Confirmed"
corresponding transfer and fee are present
the transfer to "account2" is quarantined
the transfer to "account2" is quarantined
"account1" has correct balances of "tXTZ" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "tXTZ" after "incoming" transaction
release quarantined transfers to "account2" intent is executed
"account1" has correct balances of "tXTZ" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "tXTZ" after "incoming" transaction
"tXTZ" funds are sent from "account2" to "account1"

elements.name: Avalanche ERC20 report demo transaction with address destination

steps.name: we have two recovered "avalanche-c-chain-testnet-fuji" accounts
parameters are set to prepare for "ALOT" erc20 transfer
the following "avalanche-c-chain-testnet-fuji" fee strategy is used
"account1" and "account2" have enough of native currency and "ALOT" on the balance for token transfer with funds return
the maximumFee value is set to satisfy the chosen fee strategy for erc20 transfer of "ALOT" from "account1" to "account2"
dry run of erc20 transfer of "ALOT" from "account1" to "account2" is executed with the fee strategy specified above
dry run result is success
the "ALOT" transaction intent from "account1" to "account2" is executed using a call of smart contract transfer function
transaction ledger status is "Detected or Confirmed"
corresponding transfer and fee are present
the transfer to "account2" is quarantined
"account1" has correct balances of "ALOT" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "ALOT" after "incoming" transaction
release quarantined transfers to "account2" intent is executed
"account1" has correct balances of "ALOT" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "ALOT" after "incoming" transaction
"ALOT" funds are sent from "account2" to "account1"
a root domain admin user is logged in
the current domain is a root domain
the vault is configured
pre-conditions for "avalanche-c-chain-testnet-fuji" accounts balances recovery are met
all recovery transfers are released to accounts
all policies except default are locked

elements.name: ETH ERC20 transaction to ABI endpoint

steps.name: we have two recovered "ethereum-testnet-goerli" accounts
parameters are set to prepare for "MTC" erc20 transfer
the following "ethereum-testnet-goerli" fee strategy is used
"account1" has enough of native currency to pay for erc20 smart contract call of "MTC" mint function
the maximumFee value is set to satisfy the chosen fee strategy for "MTC" mint transaction from "account1"
"account1" has minted token "MTC"
"account1" and "account2" have enough of native currency and "MTC" on the balance for token transfer with funds return
endpoint with ABI of "MTC" is created
the maximumFee value is set to satisfy the chosen fee strategy for erc20 transfer of "MTC" from "account1" to "account2" using endpoint with ABI
dry run of erc20 transfer from "account1" to "account2" using endpoint with ABI is executed with the fee strategy specified above
dry run result is success
the transaction intent from "account1" to "account2" is executed using transaction order to endpoint with ABI
transaction ledger status is "Detected or Confirmed"
corresponding transfer and fee are present
the transfer to "account2" is quarantined
"account1" has correct balances of "MTC" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "MTC" after "incoming" transaction
release quarantined transfers to "account2" intent is executed
"account1" has correct balances of "MTC" after "outgoing" transaction
"account2" has correct balances of "MTC" after "incoming" transaction
"MTC" funds are sent from "account2" to "account1"
a root domain admin user is logged in
the current domain is a root domain
the vault is configured

all recovery transfers are released to accounts
all policies except default are locked

elements.name: Replace Broadcasting Ethereum report demo transaction with too low fee

steps.name: we have two recovered "ethereum-testnet-goerli" accounts
the following "ethereum-testnet-goerli" fee strategy is used
"account1" has enough of "tETH" for native transfer
the maximumFee value is set sufficient to satisfy the chosen fee strategy for ethereum transaction from "account1" to "account2"
the ethereum fee rate is amended to be "80" percent less then specified current market rate
ethereum transaction to send "tETH" from "account1" to "account2" is executed
transaction processing status is "Broadcasting"
the following "ethereum-testnet-goerli" fee strategy is used
"account1" has enough of "tETH" for native transfer
the maximumFee value is set sufficient to satisfy the chosen fee strategy for ethereum transaction from "account1" to "account2"
replacement transaction from "account1" to "account2" is executed
replacement transaction ledger status is "Detected or Confirmed"
transaction processing status is "Interrupted" with cause "Replacement"
a root domain admin user is logged in
the current domain is a root domain
the vault is configured
pre-conditions for "ethereum-testnet-goerli" accounts balances recovery are met
all recovery transfers are released to accounts
all policies except default are locked

cancellation intent for transaction order is executed

"account2" has correct balances of "tMATIC" after "incoming" transaction
